ISSUE.TITLE: generated uuid is not returned on record creation with rest API
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.11.42 Database used in NC_DB URL : pg Project was created by clicking : New Project by connecting to external database Database on which spreadsheet is created : pg OS on which NocoDB is running : Ubuntu 20.04 Node.js version if running as node : as in docker image Database version : Postgres 14.0 **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create any table 2. Add any field with uuid type with `gen_random_uuid()` default value 3. Create any record with rest api. Result will include null value for the field. **Expected behavior** Result should include generated uuid.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: show password dialog only when required - upgrade nc-help (fixed primary key creation problem with whitespace) re #937 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
